title: IMateLoadReference.IGetFaces
description: Gets the supplemental faces of the mate associated with the specified component.
signature:
Face2 IGetFaces( 
   System.Int32
WhichOne
,
   System.Int32
FaceCount
)
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of supplemental faces VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
The supplemental faces can belong to one of two components. Specify the component that owns the supplemental faces that you want to access.
Before calling this method, call
IMateLoadReference::GetFacesCount
to determine the size of the array for that method.
